CustomField.description: The Lookup identifies the Salesforce Ticket this Vote contributes to. This is auto-populated through Upvoting or Downvoting on the Salesforce Ticket page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Lookup identifies the Salesforce Ticket this Vote contributes to. This is auto-populated through Upvoting or Downvoting on the Salesforce Ticket page.
CustomField.label: Salesforce Ticket
